description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.20jNBiIIxaiOVyi0]{Oozemorph Dedication}

Trigger You fail (but donâ€™t critically fail) a saving throw against an effect with the visual trait.

You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty. You get a success on the save against the triggering effect, but you are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for the duration the effect would have had on a failure. At that time, your eyes regrow and your normal vision returns.
